top.title: Trump caps refugee admissions at record low - with most to be white South Africans
top.summary: The president sets the limit at 7,500 for the coming year, a dramatic cut from 125,000.

top.title: How teenager gave a street concert and was caught up in Russia's repressive past
top.summary: Diana Loginova sang songs critical of the Kremlin. The 18-year-old and her bandmate are now in court.

top.title: 'We saw people murdered in front of us' - Sudan siege survivors speak to the BBC
top.summary: Harrowing accounts from people who have escaped an RSF assault on the besieged city of el-Fasher.

top.title: Watchdog slams O2 over unexpected price rise
top.summary: The media regulator said it was disappointed O2 raised prices more than was advertised when customers took out contracts.

top.title: First UK phones to get satellite connectivity in signal blackspots announced
top.summary: Virgin Media O2 has partnered with Elon Musk firm Starlink to offer the service.

top.title: Websites disabled in Microsoft global outage come back online
top.summary: Microsoft 365 and its Azure cloud computing platform were hit with DNS issues, similar to the recent AWS outage.

title.#text: Tim Cook says more AIs are coming to Apple Intelligence
Samsung’s AirPods Pro look-alikes have fallen to their best price in months
